title: alpha client
body: i need to re-instal the alpha client, but i do not know how i need to do it. PLEASE help me !!!!{{champion:53}} {{champion:53}} ****

replies.body:
The way that the New Client is installed requires you to complete a clean reinstall of League entirely in order to reinstall the New Client assets. I recommend performing a clean reinstall using [_this guide specifically_](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) in order to achieve a proper reinstall.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
